Description

Protect your tower from invading Creepers using wild contraptions, powerful upgrades, or maybe just... jump on their heads! Tempest Tower reinvents Tower Defense with a thrilling mix of strategic base-building and engaging player-driven combat! An ominous dark fog has engulfed the world of Trip Space, unleashing endless hordes of Creepers from the shadows! Only you can stand against the tide. Build powerful contraptions, save cute creatures, and stomp on Creeper heads, whatever it takes to claim Victory. Explore, plan, and meticulously construct your base during the Build Phase. Execute, adapt, and ruthlessly brawl with hordes of Creepers during the Action Phase. Every level is a thrilling test of strategy and skill.

History

Tempest Tower has been in production since January 2024. The game will be released via Early Access as Half Past Yellow's first self-published title in the first half of 2025. Tempest Tower aims to bring the much-loved game feel and bouncy animation style found in Time on Frog Island to a completely new genre. After Half Past Yellow's struggles to find a publisher for their First-Person Puzzler, Spectacle, they decided to make a radical shift in direction. The studio directed their resources to a totally new project that they could self-publish in a reasonable time frame. Half Past Yellow have focused in on what they do best, a genre mash-up with a charming art style and great game feel.
